analyzed: citta sasa ṭṭha duka kusala ttika

original: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: citta sasaṭṭham kusalam dhammam paṭicca na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭho naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
analyzed: citta sasaṭṭham akusalam dhammam paṭicca na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka abyākata mūlam tīṇi eva paccaya vasena
